Lesson 6: Model Refinement

Source: vignettes/lesson_6.Rmd
lesson_6.Rmd

Lesson 6: Model Refinement

In Lesson 6, we will explore model refinement. You will learn how to create a new model with parameter estimates from a previously executed model. We will then add covariates into our new model and explore their impact using model diagnostic plots.




Webinar Overview

In the webinar we will cover the following topics:

  • Using the copyModel() function to create a new model with parameter estimates from the fitted base model
  • Adding covariates and fitting additional covariate models
  • Exploring covariate effects using model diagnostic plots
